questions.text: Which version control system (VCS) do you primarily use for your full-stack development projects?
How often do you utilize unit testing within your full-stack development workflow?
What is your preferred approach for handling data persistence in your full-stack projects?
Which of the following best describes your experience level with both front-end and back-end development?
options: Strong experience in both front-end and back-end development
More experience in front-end development, with some back-end knowledge
More experience in back-end development, with some front-end knowledge
Primarily focused on front-end or back-end development

questions.text: In your full-stack development experience, how do you balance and prioritize tasks between front-end and back-end development during a project?
What are the biggest challenges you face when working on a full-stack project, and how do you overcome them?
When learning new technologies, do you find it more beneficial to learn front-end and back-end aspects simultaneously or focus on one at a time? Why?
